articles.author: Camila Russo
articles.description: Celsius, the crypto lender that last month halted withdrawals, has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, the company said in a press release. User withdrawals will remain halted.
articles.title: Crypto Lender Celsius Files for Bankruptcy Protection User withdrawals will remain halted.
